summary:
=== Purchase Information === Product Title: [ANSWER NINETEEN+] Kkocopack - Nose Pore Strips (24ml x 5 Packets), Deep Cleansing Blackhead Peel Off 3-Step Kit, Remove Blackheads Review Date: 2017/09/12 Store: ANSWER NINETEEN+ Average Rating: 3.8 Product Details: {'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'Product Dimensions': '7.2 x 0.12 x 6.1 inches; 0.48 Ounces'} Review Text: i was having a lot of problems with black and white heads but after using this pack it seems to have solved the problem. its divided into 3 easy steps so its super simple to use. i am planning on taking this everywhere i go, even when i go on vacations. i do have to say this is really strong stuff. i used another nose pack couple of days ago so i was doubting if more will be pulled out but, sure enough! even more were pulled out of my nose! i really want to show u guys but its super gross so i'll skip that part :) i reall like this product. im definately going to buy more! Review Title: its pretty awesome Rating: 5.0 -------------------------------------------------- === Purchase Information === Product Title: Gold Ginseng Supernova Sheet Mask (28g x 5 packets)– Contains GOLD Ginseng Berry Extract, Regenerate Aged Skin, Protect Your Skin From Wrinkles and Visible Signs of Aging Review Date: 2017/12/17 Store: Ancors Average Rating: 3.6 Product Details: {'Brand': 'Ancors', 'Item Form': 'Sheet', 'Skin Type': 'All', 'Unit Count': '1.0 Count', 'Number of Items': '5', 'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'Product Dimensions': '8.86 x 1.02 x 6.3 inches; 8.01 Ounces'} Review Text: My skin is very dry therefore I wear this facemask every night before I go to bed.
This is probably the best decision I make on a daily basis. I really love how it smells
and it feels like there are a lot of good stuff soaking into my skin. I use the rest of the
essence left over in the package on my body and it makes me feel wonderful. I've noticed
amazing results after using this. Review Title: This is probably the best decision I make on a daily basis Rating: 5.0 -------------------------------------------------- === Purchase Information === Product Title: [KimSohyungFull] BONCHO Real Chrysanthemum Sheet Mask (23ml x 10 packets) - Contains 6% Real Natural Chrysanthemum Petals, 3-layer 100% Natural Botanical Sheet, Anti-Aging Review Date: 2018/03/16 Store: KimSohyungFull Average Rating: 3.9 Product Details: {'Brand': 'KimSohyungFull', 'Item Form': 'Sheet', 'Scent': 'Chrysanthemum', 'Skin Type': 'All', 'Special Feature': 'Not Tested On Animals', 'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'Product Dimensions': '5.2 x 6.57 x 1.38 inches; 11.99 Ounces'} Review Text: I used this when my face feels dry or when it stings a bit. I put it on after washing my face, before I go to sleep. The solution bonds to the face well and it leaves my face feeling hydrated and shining. Because the mask clings to the face really well, it seems like my face absorbs all of the solution. Because there are real chrysanthemums are on the mask, its really pretty and the scent is amazing. It felt like I was relaxed by just smelling the flowers.
-- Review Title: it seems like my face absorbs all of the solution Rating: 5.0 -------------------------------------------------- === Purchase Information === Product Title: [KimSohyungFull] BONCHO Real Mugwort Sheet Mask (23ml x 10 packets) - Contains 8% Real Natural Mugwort Leaves, Innovative 3-layer 100% Natural Botanical Sheet, Anti-Aging Review Date: 2018/03/16 Store: KimSohyungFull Average Rating: 5.0 Product Details: {'Brand': 'KimSohyungFull', 'Item Form': 'Sheet', 'Scent': 'Mugwort', 'Skin Type': 'All', 'Unit Count': '10.00 Count', 'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'Product Dimensions': '5.2 x 6.57 x 1.38 inches; 12.1 Ounces'} Review Text: When you feel like your skin needs rejuvenation and rest, the mugwort mask pack is probably a perfect fit. At first, I didn’t even know what a mugwort was, I had to look it up. It is used for many things and it seems like its very healthy for you as well. I used it when my face broke out into a mild rash and after using the mask, my face cooled and cleared up. And it smells really fresh too! Its pretty cool to see actual mugworts on the mask pack as well. Review Title: When you feel like your skin needs rejuvenation and rest Rating: 5.0 -------------------------------------------------- === Purchase Information === Product Title: [KimSohyungFull] BONCHO Real Safflower Sheet Mask (23ml x 10 packets) - Contains 4% Real Natural Safflower Petals, Innovative 3-layer 100% Natural Botanical Sheet, Anti-Aging Review Date: 2018/03/16 Store: KimSohyungFull Average Rating: 5.0 Product Details: {'Brand': 'KimSohyungFull', 'Skin Type': 'Oily, Combination, Sensitive, Dry, Normal, Acne-prone', 'Unit Count': '10.00 Count', 'Number of Items': '10', 'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'Product Dimensions': '5.2 x 6.57 x 1.38 inches; 11.99 Ounces'} Review Text: I used it when I felt like my skin needed nutrients. When I pulled off the mask from my face, there was a white residue but do not worry! It is because there are real flowers on the mask pack and all you have to do is just pick it off or wipe it off. I use 1 pack a day and it seems to work wonders for my face. Review Title: I used it when I felt like my skin needed nutrients Rating: 5.0 --------------------------------------------------

prompt:
Based on this purchase history, analyze and summarize this person's genuine preferences and patterns in under 256 words. Think step by step: 1. First, identify consistent patterns in ratings and sentiments 2. Next, observe common themes across product purposes and use cases 3. Then, note recurring quality preferences and price sensitivity patterns 4. Finally, synthesize these observations into core preferences Remember to: - Focus only on keywords and trends supported by multiple interactions - Avoid repeating specific product names or details - Base conclusions strictly on the provided purchase data Here's the purchase data: === Purchase Information === Product Title: [ANSWER NINETEEN+] Kkocopack - Nose Pore Strips (24ml x 5 Packets), Deep Cleansing Blackhead Peel Off 3-Step Kit, Remove Blackheads Review Date: 2017/09/12 Store: ANSWER NINETEEN+ Average Rating: 3.8 Product Details: {'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'Product Dimensions': '7.2 x 0.12 x 6.1 inches; 0.48 Ounces'} Review Text: i was having a lot of problems with black and white heads but after using this pack it seems to have solved the problem. its divided into 3 easy steps so its super simple to use. i am planning on taking this everywhere i go, even when i go on vacations. i do have to say this is really strong stuff. i used another nose pack couple of days ago so i was doubting if more will be pulled out but, sure enough! even more were pulled out of my nose! i really want to show u guys but its super gross so i'll skip that part :) i reall like this product. im definately going to buy more! Review Title: I used it when I felt like my skin needed nutrients Rating: 5.0 -------------------------------------------------- Structure your response as: SUMMARY: [Final synthesis of preferences and patterns]
raw_response:
SUMMARY:
The analysis of shopping behavior reveals a clear preference for skincare products, particularly sheet masks, with an emphasis on deep cleansing, hydration, and anti-aging benefits. The consumer consistently rates products highly, often giving 5-star reviews, indicating strong satisfaction with the efficacy and sensory experience of the items.

Common themes in product use indicate a focus on addressing specific skin concerns like dryness, blackheads, and irritation. The user appears to favor simple, three-step applications that offer immediate and noticeable results, valuing usability and convenience, as evidenced by their willingness to take products on vacations.

Quality preferences lean towards natural ingredients, with an appreciation for botanical extracts such as ginseng, mugwort, and chrysanthemum, suggesting a trend towards health-conscious and organic beauty solutions. Sentiment analysis shows a strong positive emotional connection with the products, including pleasure from scents and packaging aesthetics.

Price sensitivity is less apparent, with the consumer prioritizing product effectiveness and quality over cost, as demonstrated by purchasing premium options without hesitation. Overall, this consumer exhibits a dedicated commitment to skincare routines, favoring hydrative, nutrient-rich treatments that enhance skin's texture and appearance.

target_interaction.title: Good
target_interaction.text: People tell me my skin is really awesome but I know that they are going a bit overboard. In all seriousness, my skin is on the dry side. Well… it got super dry because the heater is on 24/7 AND!!!! That’s why I couldn’t wait for this product to come. The first thing that stood out was its neat packaging (thank you seller by the way). Trust me, use this and wait for the next day and see what wonders it does to your skin. My face felt brighter and moist. Also, after using this mask pack, it feels my makeup looked and applied better on my skin. I highly recommend this product if you want baddass skin.
target_interaction.title_meta: Hushu Intensive Recovery Mask, Korean Premium Facial mask 5 Sheets
